title: Designing Self-Regulated Learning Strategies Using Generative AI and Personality Traits

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic generative AI usage and familiarity with self-regulated learning concepts
context.additional_context: Utilization of generative AI tools in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, applied to language learning domains

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three generative AI utilization strategies tailored to their personality traits (openness, extraversion, conscientiousness).
Learners can systematically execute the stages of learning goal setting (forethought), performance, and self-reflection using generative AI such as ChatGPT.
Learners can improve language learning outcomes by over 20% over four weeks by applying self-regulated learning strategies based on personality traits.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
